comments.body: In https://www.activestate.com/products/python/ they say they include pandas, and they now have a 3.6 version, so it should be true.

`here <https://www.activestate.com/activepython/downloads>`__. Versions
2.7, 3.5 and 3.6 include pandas.

Installing using your Linux distribution's package manager.
